item.title: NEED HELP Error i dont know how to fix!
item.dc:creator: @rarely rarely
item.description:
@rarely wrote:

I just added some donator only items into my itemassisstant.java and i compiled and all was fine until I tried to run the source and this came up:

Exception in thread “main” java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError
Caused by: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 16
at server.world.ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:377)
at server.world.ItemHandler.(ItemHandler.java:34)
at server.Server.(Server.java:62)
Press any key to continue . . .

Obviously I went into the Itemhandler.java file too see what the error was and I couldn’t find anything. Any help would be greatly appreciated. My itemassistant.java code is this:

public static final int[] donItems = {13362, 13360, 13358, 13355, 13354, 13352, 13350, 13348, 13346};

**/

	public boolean wearItem(int wearID, int slot) {
	if(c.isDonator == 0)
	for(int i : donItems)
	if(wearID == i) {
	c.sendMessage("@red@You must be a donator to wear this item.");
	return false;
	}
	synchronized(c) {
		int targetSlot=0;
		if (wearID > 15085 && wearID < 15102){
			if (c.clanId >= 0){
				c.useDice(wearID, true);

-These are the 2 bits of code that i had to put in to try make donor only items and after i coded that the error came up-

Again, any help will be greatly appreciated. Also if anyone has any knowledge on how to add super donor/ an extra donor rank and how to add custom items in such as a kiln cape on a 317 then please throw that in there as well or pm me. Thanks in advance!

Read full topic
